txt.en: Wood is in short supply in Khazad-dûm, and the pieces of scaffold found around the Flaming Deeps could prove useful for the repair efforts being performed beneath The Cross-roads of Ash.\n\nThere should be a decent supply of pieces of scaffold found throughout the tunnels east of Hadâd-mezer.

'Wood is in short supply in Khazad-dûm, and the scaffold-pieces found around the Flaming Deeps could prove useful for the repair efforts being performed beneath The Cross-roads of Ash.\n\n'There should be a decent supply of scaffold-pieces found throughout the tunnels east of Hadâd-mezer.'
'We cannot burn the cave itself...without enough lumber, Mazog will not believe our ruse.'
'This will do perfectly. There is enough wood to assist with the refurbishing efforts. I'll see to it that it arrives safely at The Cross-roads of Ash. Thank you very much.'
Gapi, a dwarf located at Anazârmekhem is organizing efforts to repair the bridges at the Cross-roads of Ash, and would like you to gather pieces of scaffold for him.

Pieces of scaffold can be found in the tunnels east of Hadâd-mezer and Bhraf-ru, both south of Anazârmekhem.\n\nYou should collect pieces of scaffold for the repairs going on beneath the Cross-roads of Ash.
Bring the pieces of scaffold to Gapi at Anazârmekhem
Gapi is at Anazârmekhem, located to the north-west of Hadâd-mezer.\n\nYou should bring the scaffold-pieces you gathered to Gapi.
